triples.name: Artificial neural network
triples.relevance: The paper proposes adaptive neural networks to approximate unknown internal dynamics in control systems.

triples.name: State observer
triples.relevance: The paper develops an adaptive neural network state observer to estimate immeasurable states.

triples.name: Feedback
triples.relevance: The paper employs output feedback to control the nonlinear systems.

triples.name: Backstepping
triples.relevance: Backstepping technique is used to develop the virtual and actual optimal controllers.

triples.name: Lyapunov function
triples.relevance: Barrier Lyapunov functions are employed to guarantee system states remain within predefined constraint sets.

triples.name: Nonlinear control
triples.relevance: The paper addresses control design for strict-feedback nonlinear systems with unknown dynamics.

triples.name: Optimal control
triples.relevance: The paper develops optimal controllers with barrier type cost functions for subsystems.

triples.name: Actor-critic algorithm
triples.relevance: The paper employs an actor-critic architecture in the optimal control framework design.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: The paper proposes adaptive neural network-based control that adjusts to unknown system dynamics.
